meanings.definition: Having the strongest or most intense mint flavor.
meanings.sent1: The gum had the mintiest taste I've ever experienced.
meanings.sent2: The toothpaste claimed to be the mintiest on the market.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally ate the mintiest candy in the whole store!
meanings.sent4: Her breath was so minty, it was like she had swallowed the mintiest gum in the world.
meanings.sent5: The mintiest ice cream I ever tried left a refreshing sensation in my mouth.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the highest level of freshness or coolness.
meanings.sent1: The mintiest breeze blew through the open window.
meanings.sent2: She wore the mintiest dress to the summer party.
meanings.sent3: The mintiest drink quenched my thirst on the hottest day.
meanings.sent4: His mintiest ideas always brought a fresh perspective to the team.
meanings.sent5: The mintiest morning air filled my lungs as I stepped outside.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of the adjective 'minty', describing something with the most mint-like taste or smell.
meanings.sent1: The mintiest aroma wafted from the freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with the mintiest herbs I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: She wore the mintiest perfume that reminded me of a mint garden.
meanings.sent4: The mintiest candle in the room made it feel like a mint paradise.
meanings.sent5: The mintiest tea transported me to a field of fresh mint leaves.
